title: Ovechkin nets No. 891, trails Gretzky mark by 3
description: Capitals star Alex Ovechkin is just three goals away from tying Wayne Gretzky's record for career goals after scoring No. 891 against the Bruins.

title: Campbell reunites with Cards for 18th NFL season
description: Six-time Pro-Bowl defensive lineman Calais Campbell has finalized a one-year deal to return to the Arizona Cardinals for his 18th NFL season, the team announced.

title: 'A special player' - resurgent Elanga has Forest dreaming
description: Anthony Elanga had left Manchester United in his past. On Tuesday, they trailed in his wake - to Nottingham Forest's benefit.

title: Saka goal a 'beautiful moment' but injury worries for Arsenal
description: Bukayo Saka enjoys goalscoring return for Arsenal, but defensive worries hit Gunners as Gabriel looks set to miss Champions League tie.

title: Premier League to introduce semi-automated offsides this month
description: The Premier League will introduce semi-automated offside technology for the first time on Saturday April 12.

title: Haaland ruled out for up to seven weeks
description: Manchester City forward Erling Haaland could be out for up to seven weeks with an ankle injury, manager Pep Guardiola has confirmed.

title: 49ers will add competition for player who struggled badly in 2024
description: The San Francisco 49ers aren't just handing the starting kicker job to Jake Moody.

title: Golden State Warriors jersey history - No. 9 - Connie Dierking (1965)
description: During his time suiting up for the Warriors, Dierking wore only jersey Nos. 18 and 9 and put up 8.0 points, 6.5 rebounds, and 1.0 assists per game.
